mapper.select: SELECT `year`,SUM(print_times) AS print_times FROM zz_time_month_count GROUP BY `year` ORDER BY `year`
SELECT `year`,`month`,SUM(print_times) AS print_times FROM zz_time_month_count GROUP BY `year`,`month` ORDER BY `year`,`month`
SELECT `year`,`month`,`day`,SUM(print_times) AS print_times FROM zz_time_day_count GROUP BY `year`,`month`,`day` ORDER BY `year`,`month`,`day`
